title: ☼►BROCKTON - Attic STUDIO - Two Very Small Rooms - 3rd floor
neighborhood: BROCKTON, Avon, Randolph, Stoughton, Abington, South Shore
posting_body: Located on the quite side street
Eat-in kitchen (place a table), with a closet.
Bedroom with closet and carpet     floor.
Building  is clean and very quit, occupied by  working residents.
Located off Pleasant St. on   Oakland Ave. in nice neighborhood near park.
There is bus line on Pleasant St.
walk to Westgate   mall and commuter train.
Ride to Boston takes about    35-40 minutes.
First and last months and security deposit required to move in.
Please read this ad again, check the map and directions and then...
call (781) 408-9280 for more information and to see this apartment
